title: Qualitative Analysis-Based Project Design for Improving Field Practicum Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fieldwork experience and basic job performance capabilities
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones to analyze real-world problems encountered in field training environments and derive improvement strategies through project-based tasks

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interactions between potential factors in practical training environments and actual experiences
Learners can propose improvements for training environments through collaborative agency (collective agency)
Learners can develop a practical task design framework considering job relevance in social sectors

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
